ModuleDescription:
The module covers corporate governance from a multidisciplinary
perspective including law, finance, accounting
and economics. The module covers enterprise risk
management in terms of the Integrated Framework issued
by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the
Treadway Commission (COSO).
Prerequisite:
ACC1002 Financial Accounting, BSP1004 Legal
Environment of Business, FIN2004 Finance
Preclusion:
ACC3611 Corporate Governance and Ethics
ACC3612 Risk Management and Internal Control
Only available to BBA and BBA(Acc) students from the
AY2014-15 intake and later
